metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38618 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the VZT facgeometryparsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vzt file canlead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a maliciousfile to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns theinteger overflow when allocating the `rows` array.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
